colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @019A *, ,(CES BSANGS KYIS CHO GA DNGOS GRUB KYI GZI 'OD 'BAR MONG MTSAR RIN PO CHE'I 'PHRENG BA ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, RIGS DUS CHO 'BRANG SOGS STONG DU MA'I DPAL GYIS MNGON PAR MTHO ZHING, KHYAD PAR RGYAL BA GNYIS PA'I BSTAN PA BSTAN 'DZIN LA MA'I PHYED PA'I DAD PA DANG LDAN PA, RNAM PAR DPYOD PA'I MIG YANG GA-YO BAS SHIS GYIS DKYIL 'KHOR MTHA' DAG LA GZIGS PA GSAL RAB SOGS, DAM PAS BSDAGS PA'I YON TAN LDAN PA, LCAGS RA'I NAS SDE RIN PO CHE'I DON GRUB RAB BRTAN SKU BA CHED KYI BKAS BSKUL BA LA BDREN PAS, SDE NOD 'DZIN PA CHOS KYIS RGYAL MTSAN GYIS DPAL 'KHOR BDE CHEN DU SBYAR BA 'DIS KYANG, PHYOGS DUS THAMS CAD DU DGE BAR GYUR CIG ,DGE LEGS 'PHEL, ,)
